name: Graveyard Shift 2 [Double Boned Update]
description:
UPDATE - Double Boned Update v008 is live adding -

  • 4 PLAYER CO-OP
  • APACHE BOSSFIGHT
  • SOME HATS (under options menu)

There are still some bugs, in particular, the round restarting after a game-over or victory sometimes just breaks everything and you have to restart the game. The code is still pretty messy with this being my first dabble in multiplayer so apologies in advance.

It's  Halloween and the local hooligans have nothing better to do than to vandalize your graveyard! You (and perhaps your boney friends) won't stand for it!

Hop, Doot, and Smack your way through waves of ornery  kids and their agitated parents as you try to protect your spooky home!

FEATURES

  • Solo Play
  • 4 Player Online Co-Op (Listen Server)
  • Infinite Wave Mode - Survive as long as you can!
  • Graveyard Defense Mode - Survive for 10 increasingly harder waves, topped with a boss fight!
  • Lots and lots of dooting

This title is more or less out of development now. I'll attempt to fix game-breaking bugs as they occur.
